entry.title: Kool-It KBF-60 - 59" Floor Model Full Service Refrigerated Corner Glass Display Case - 15.9 Cu. Ft.
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kool-It
Type: Refrigerated Display Case
Price: 7020.00

The Kool-It KBF-60 is a 59" curved glass corner display case with full refrigeration. It features a forced-air, self-contained refrigeration unit, making this perfect for bakery goods and other items. Its tempered safety glass and stainless steel body panels make it durable and secure. Its clear glass-design displays your baked goods with class and functionality.

      • Forced air & self-contained refrigeration
      • Modern design
      • Merchandises a variety of goods
      • Digital temperature control
      • Automatic defrost
      • Exterior tempered safety glass
      • Removable rear sliding glass doors
      • Two height-adjustable shelves
      • Stainless steel lower body panels
      • LED lighting
      • Slide out condensing unit for easy maintenance 
      • Simple plug-in installation
      • Four casters

Capacity 15.9 cu. ft. 
Dimensions (WDH) 59" x 26.7" x 47"

Amps 4.52, 0.62
Compressor 1/3, N/A
Ship Weight 672 lb, 570 lb
